A

AbstractOperationsProvider<T> - Class in ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.operationsprovider
Just one variant of OperationsProvider interface implementation, that is responsible for providing operations for Calculator.

Constructs an OperationProvider with mappings from operation name to Operation instance provided by operationsMap.

Returns an adapter to use this OperationsProvider as Complex one.

Calculator<T> - Class in ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator

Complex - Record Class in ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.complex
The Complex record obviously represents a complex number, which is defined as an element of a number system that extends the real numbers with a specific element denoted i, called the imaginary unit and satisfying the equation i^2 = -1; every complex number can be expressed in the form a+bi, where a, b âˆˆ R.
Complex(double, double) - Constructor for record class ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.complex.Complex
Creates an instance of a Complex record class.

DoubleOperationsProvider - Class in ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.operationsprovider
An implementation of OperationsProvider with Double as a type of operand and a set of basic arithmetic operations, such as "+", "-", "*", "/", "^" with obvious meanings, some trigonometrical operations - "sin" and "cos" - and "to-deg" and "to-rad", providing conversion from radians to degree and backwards.
DoubleOperationsProvider() - Constructor for class ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.operationsprovider.DoubleOperationsProvider
Constructs an instance of ComplexOperationProvider.

Function<T> - Interface in ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.operation
